title: Regarding slow email downloading problem
content:
Like some other users, my TB (v134.0.1) was still slow to find and download my emails. Even though TB was lightning fast for years before this slowness epidemic started, I decided to fiddle with settings. I tried various things that seemed logical, but had no success until I changed the "Connection Security" in "Server Settings" for all my accounts from SSL/TLS to STARTTLS. My guess is that the TB devs have changed the way it communicates with mail servers about security and some can't deal with it quickly enough!

Your mileage will likely vary, so make a note of your settings before changing anything and only ever change one type of setting at a time in only one account before doing a test. I hope this helps at least some users and reduces their frustration.
creator: Jay.Dear

title: Topic: Unable to send emails: Message says (Add Security Exception)
content:
Hi, I'm unable to send emails or reply to emails. I keep getting a window pop up that says 'Add Security Exception' Then after I close that the following message comes up

Sending of message failed Unable to communicate securely with peer requested domain name does not match the server's certificate The configuration related to must be corrected.

I have no idea what all this means. It's only just started happening since I did a Thunderbird upgrade. I hope you are able to help me please? My apologies but I'm unable to attach screenshot pictures. Thank you for your time. Kind Regards Jen
creator: rjwrev

title: Thuderbird stopped working
content:
Thunderbird stopped working. I received the following message - "Add Security Exception You are about to override how Thunderbird identifies this site. Legitimate banks, stores and other public sites will not ask you to do this. Location: smtp.optusnet.com.au:25 This site attempts to identify itself with invalid inforation The certificate belongs to a different site, which could mean that someone is trying to impersonate this site

Permanently store this exception"

I have clicked on 'Confirm Security Exception" but I still can't send or receive emails.
creator: edbev

title: Updated Thunderbird on a IMac
content: I just updated my OS operating system on an IMac and got an error message that the Thunderbird app was corrupted and needed to be removed. I installed a new version of Thunderbird, but now I only see emails from about the last three weeks from my Webmail account. Previously, I think Thunderbird was saving messages on my computer. Does anyone know how to retrieve my old messages dating back a few years?

title: can no longer read or send mail in any of accunts
content:
I have internet connection. I can for example use firefox and read news.

Even after the update is finished,when the laptop seems working otherwise fine, and i have rebooted my laptop Thunderbird has problems. Thundrrbird enters an infinite attempt to contact mail servers if i send or update inbox from 3 different accounts. One is microsoft365 the other is gmail and the third is one.com . All enter infinite attempts with no success at all.
